channel.title: [317] CastleWars PvP - Update Log
channel.description:
[center][u][b][size=30pt][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100327042707/runescape/images/3/3d/Castlewars_hood_red.png[/img]CastleWars PvP - By The Unholy[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100327042707/runescape/images/3/3d/Castlewars_hood_red.png[/img][/size][/b][/u][/center]
[center][u][b]Features so far[/b][/u] ● New Fight Caves; Lowered from 63 Waves to 27! ● Home area moved to Castle Wars ● Saradomin Portal teleports you to Edgeville Wild ● Guthix Portal teleports you to Mage Bank ● Zamorak portal teleports you to [Multi] Varrock wild ● Added some commands & changed shops accordingly. ● Added some 377+ Weapon models and armour, 100% animated. [/center]
[center][u][b]Still to come[/b][/u] [s]● Make portals teleport[/s] [s]● Add a few commands for starter gea[/s]r [s]● Make the bank chest work ● Add a few weapon models[/s] ● Other various things[/center]
[center][u][b]Screenshots[/b][/u][/center]

item.title: [317] CastleWars PvP - Update Log
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

[center][size=30pt]CastleWars PvP - By The Unholy[/size][/center]

[center]Features so far
● New Fight Caves; Lowered from 63 Waves to 27!
● Home area moved to Castle Wars
● Saradomin Portal teleports you to Edgeville Wild
● Guthix Portal teleports you to Mage Bank
● Zamorak portal teleports you to [Multi] Varrock wild
● Added some commands & changed shops accordingly.
● Added some 377+ Weapon models and armour, 100% animated.
[/center]

[center]Still to come
● Make portals teleport
● Add a few commands for starter gear
● Make the bank chest work
● Add a few weapon models
● Other various things[/center]

[center]Screenshots[/center]

Read full topic
